item.description:
The message below forwarded from Bob Boudreau. Please email him questions at hits2222@verizon.net.

I have participated in the men's program for years. The coaching is excellent and has made me a better player, indoors & out.

The women's coach is Vicky Wong, who also coaches at Emerson College.

Matt
-- 

HITS Tryouts, August 2011.  Waltham HS, doors open at 6:30PM for warmups, and we hold Tryouts 7 - 9PM.  If you have never participated, you can find the HITS Program Description on the HITS Website, at hitsvolleyball.com.    Tryout Cost: $15.  11 Week HITS Program Cost: $180.   If you are definitely at Tryouts, let me know, and I can get a head start on the Tryouts Rosters.   New News:  This season we are re-instituting Women's HITS, on Tuesday Nights.  Women's HITS Tryouts, Tuesday, 30 August.  At Women's HITS, the Net is at Women's Height.   If you are unsure about participation in HITS, then attend Tryouts, and make an informed decision.

The women's program will run every Tuesday.

Bob Boudreau

hits2222@verizon.net
item.how_to_find_us: Gym at the back of the complex
item.name: Women's Coached Drills
